Why WiredTree?

Complete Managementhttp://www.wiredtree.com/supportservices/
Our plans feature complete management - software + hardware + network + proactive monitoring. Quite simply, we take care of your server so that you can run your business. We provide you full 24/7/365 phone and help desk support for all software that comes installed on your VPS, including the OS and control panel, as well as for a variety of other commonly used hosting software packages. Each server comes with 24/7/365 monitoring as well as proactive response to any downed services. The response is configurable in your client portal. Your server is kept up to date with all of the latest security patches.

Average ticket response time is under 15 minutes!

Treat your VPS like a big reseller account!

24x7 Proactive Monitoringhttp://www.wiredtree.com/supportservices/
Each server comes with 24/7/365 monitoring as well as proactive response to any downed services. The response is configurable in your client portal.

True Server-Grade Hardwarehttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedvps/
All of our servers also feature the latest in true server-grade hardware. Our VPS servers feature dual-core AMD Opteron processors, ECC Memory, RAID-10 disk arrays, and SuperMicro motherboards.

ServerShield Server Hardeninghttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedservers/serverhardening.php
All WiredTree VPS servers include our exclusive initial security hardening service, ServerShield, free of charge. This service saves you time and money by greatly increasing the security, performance, and reliability of your WiredTree server. It includes APF firewall, anti-spam and anti-virus configuration, Brute Force Detection, HTTP intrusion protection, and more!

Extensive Featureshttp://www.wiredtree.com/managedvps/features.php
All VPS accounts are truly reseller-ready and come with full root access. Cpanel/WHM + Fantastico are included, as are private nameservers and generous disk space and bandwidth allowances. Additionally, they are backed up nightly to an off-server RAID array.

All VPS accounts feature a 30 day moneyback guarantee!

and Introducing... Hybrid Dedicated Servers! The power and reliability of enterprise-class servers without the enterprise price tag!

What is a Hybrid Dedicated?

A hybrid dedicated server is a combination of a powerful enterprise-class server with virtualization technology. We start with a dual processor dual-core Xeon Woodcrest server with fully buffered memory and a SATAII RAID-10 disk array and then use Virtuozzo to securely isolate the server into four seperate Hybrid server environments. Each Hybrid Dedicated server has dedicated use of one of the four CPU cores on the server as well as 1GB of physical memory. Virtuozzo allows for granular control of server resources so we can isolate and guarantee each environment it's own dedicated resources.

These affordable fully managed servers bring performance and reliability features normally only found in enterprise-level hardware to the masses, and provide a value level not reached by any other provider's offerings.

When compared to similarly priced Pentium or AMD solutions, the tremendous value is apparent!
